overview: Roscoe C. Smith III is the Chairman & CEO of VerusMed where he is involved in all aspects of the companyâ€™s strategic direction and operations. Smith is also the CEO of Intellerus, LLC, the private investment firm that acquired VerusMed in February 2009. Smith is responsible for building VerusMed into a next-generation health care media company by leveraging information and interactive capabilities to build relationships and connect clients with targeted communities of health care professionals. Smith has spent over 30 years helping companies become more efficient and effective with their marketing investments. Prior to leading VerusMed, Smith was CEO of Agent Media, an integrated media and marketing services company serving the insurance and financial services industries. Prior experience includes serving as President of PBI Media, LLC, President of Knowledge Industry Publications, Inc. and Publisher of Architectural Record.
